General.Name: Jiangsu Yida Chemical Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Jiang Su Yida Chemical Co.,Ltd provides ethylene glycol ether and propylene glycol ether series, and their derivatives in China. It also offers ethyl glyme, propyl glyme, braking fluid, polyethylene glycol, and polyether products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.
